title: Hook Output (stdout from dispatcher)
description: The single JSON object the dispatcher writes to stdout. VS Code reads this to apply the hook's decision. Must be exactly one object, nothing else on stdout.

decision.description: Tool decision. Only meaningful for PreToolUse events. Ignored for other events.

denyReason.description: Human-readable reason for deny/ask. Required when decision is deny.

updatedInput.description: Semantic rewrite of tool input. Merged over original tool input by VS Code.

additionalContext.description: Context items injected into the agent's context window.

key.description: Context item key (unique per hook invocation).

value.description: Context item content (text injected into agent context).

warnings.description: Human-readable warnings. May be surfaced to the user or logged.

_debug.description: Optional debug metadata. Not consumed by VS Code but useful for diagnostics.
